root.item:
W_WANDER modifier: ** require ** W_WANDER activated
Hold W_WANDER to simulate activate NUMPAD 【 M 】=> 【 0 】; 【 , 】 => 【 00 】 【 J 】=> 【 1 】; 【 K 】 => 【 2 】; 【 L 】=> 【 3 】 【 U 】=> 【 4 】; 【 I 】 => 【 5 】; 【 O 】=> 【 6 】 【 KEY_7 】=> 【 7 】; 【 KEY_8 】 => 【 8 】; 【 KEY_9 】=> 【 9 】 【 p 】=> 【 + 】; 【 ; 】 => 【 - 】; 【 [ 】=> 【 * 】; 【 ' 】 => 【 % 】 ---------------------------------- 【 Y 】=> 【 DEL 】; 【 H 】 => 【 RETURN 】; 【 N 】=> 【 FORWARD_DEL 】 【 W_WANDER + SHIFT + H => Insert a new line below 】 【 W_WANDER + SHIFT + CONTROL + H => Insert a new line above 】
notsave.W_WANDER
__BlockUntilKeyUp__ KeyCode::W
__KeyToKey__ KeyCode::M, KeyCode::KEY_0 __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::COMMA, KeyCode::KEY_0, KeyCode::KEY_0 __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::J, KeyCode::KEY_1 __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::K, KeyCode::KEY_2 __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::L, KeyCode::KEY_3 __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::U, KeyCode::KEY_4 __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::I, KeyCode::KEY_5 __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::O, KeyCode::KEY_6
__KeyToKey__ KeyCode::P, KeyCode::EQUAL, VK_SHIFT __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::SEMICOLON, KeyCode::MINUS __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::BRACKET_LEFT, KeyCode::KEY_8, VK_SHIFT __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::QUOTE, KeyCode::KEY_5, VK_SHIFT
{{ HAPPY_RETURN }}
